This is a lot more real than the fantasy hentai usually portrays. And the girl was raped, who cares what she might have done, she was raped. The story’s pretty interesting, they used to be dating and he didn’t want to commit and seemed happy with a causal relationship, I mean he’s talking about getting girlfriends all the time to her. She’s just going along with it for now, but you can see she’s looking for something real. See the dress she wears at the end, it’s basically the same as the one she sees in the magazine. And when she mentions the president, who MC says girls like for his hair and everything

@I'mPissed: The first part of your comment is pretty much in line with what I was trying (and admittedly, poorly) to express myself: this is just a shitty situation all around. The guy is undeniably the most despicable among them, but there's plenty of blame to go around, and they both likely deserve at least some manner of pity, if not sympathy. As for the second part of your comment, I suppose that's fair enough. I mean, part of the reason I hated that aspect so much was BECAUSE it seemed so shallow in the context of what we see...

And that, kids, is why you shouldn't have sex without romantic feelings for each other. Being sex friends is just gonna get you hurt sooner or later.
And so does love. Never fall in love, it's a commitment based on lies and selfish desires.

Imo both of them is at fault, 
the girl isn't paying any attention to her looks to spicy up their relationship(using sports bra and not dollying up) so she can't expect the guy to take her seriously hence the guy's attitude toward their relationship and the break up.
The guy isn't paying attention to the girl's feelings and taking her for granted(hence the break up) so when the girl find another one that pays attention to her seriously she decide to doll up for him, but the male friend seeing this and thought of his loss and rape her out of spite(also i guess he is looking for new things hence the rapey smiling face).

But both of them is at fault because they seek something from the other.

yeah, i feel like i can relate to this doujinshi. sorry for broken english, but i had a pretty much the same relationship as the MC does. except i didn't rape anyone. it was a shitty relationship, i was in it for lust and she was just there for me. I've had my share of fun, until she decided to cheat on my ass with her ex. I think bcs I treated her badly so she escaped from me? and then she told me the truth,  i was like mad and confused af. I really thought she was joking. she didn't, we broke up. i was mad at her every day in the school. but in the end the only one suffering was me. well, maybe if it didn't happened i won't as grown up as i am now. and definitely i will do more bad things to her if she's still mine. in the end, we both got out safe, she's still my friend (after she force her way to my depressed ass). I still can't get into a relationship tho. i think i fell too deep into this whole weeabs ass things.

This just pisses me off. Yeah, he raped her. I'm not denying that was a shitty thing to do. But seriously, the girl is just as awful. What, some random guy confesses and suddenly he's the only person for her, despite everything she had done with the protagonist. Again, I'm not denying the guy's a bastard for raping her, but think about this: she hardly knows this other guy, and yet she says to guy's face that "unlike you, Yoshioka actually cares about my feelings" all the same. AFTER he pressed her to explain her reasons, which she intended to completely hide from him. SHE decided not to tell him how she felt, while also completely ignoring his feelings, wanting to put an end to their relationship without a word of explanation. Can you REALLY say she's blameless in all this? Him being a rapist, and her being a victim... Neither of those things automatically erases all the other circumstances in play.
I'm surprised nobody died.
